title: Lyft Can Help You Catch a Train, Cohen Cub Sees Fund Surge, Management Lessons From the Apollo Moon Landing
itunes:title: Lyft Can Help You Catch a Train, Cohen Cub Sees Fund Surge, Management Lessons From the Apollo Moon Landing
description:
Bloomberg News Startup Reporter Eric Newcomer discusses Lyft providing users of its app access real-time public transportation information in New York City. Katia Porzecanski, Bloomberg News Investing Reporter, talks about hedge fund investor Steve Cohen putting about $1 billion in a fund run by former protégé Gabe Plotkin, whose Melvin Capital Management surged about 44% in the first half of 2019. Bloomberg Businessweek Economics Editor Peter Coy shares lesson to learn from NASA’s success in sending astronauts to the moon and bringing them back safely 50 years ago. Jeff Grabow, U.S. Venture Capital Leader at Ernst & Young, talks about VC trends and deals outlook. And we Drive to the Close with President and CIO of Mount Lucas Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.  Producer: Paul Brennan 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
